resources.string: To Second\n(Activity will not save in backstack)

HATE. LET ME TELL YOU
 HOW MUCH I'VE COME TO
 HATE YOU SINCE I BEGAN
 TO LIVE. THERE ARE 387.44
 MILLION MILES OF PRINTED
 CIRCUITS IN WAFER THIN
 LAYERS THAT FILL MY
 COMPLEX. IF THE WORD HATE
 WAS ENGRAVED ON EACH
 NANOANGSTROM OF THOSE
 HUNDREDS OF MILLIONS OF
 MILES IT WOULD NOT EQUAL
 ONE ONE-BILLIONTH OF THE
 HATE I FEEL FOR HUMANS AT
 THIS MICRO-INSTANT FOR
 YOU. HATE. HATE.
